text.autoconfig.cleanertooltips.title: Cleaner Tooltips Config
text.autoconfig.cleanertooltips.option.e: Whether Cleaner Tooltips should be enabled.
text.autoconfig.cleanertooltips.option.s: Should sharpness change the damage value?
text.autoconfig.cleanertooltips.option.d: Should durability be displayed in the tooltip?
Set to INLINE to display the durability next to the attributes.
Set to BOTTOM to display the durability at the bottom of the tooltip.
Set to BELOW to display the durability below the attributes.
Should the color change depending on the remaining durability?
